name: Open Platformer
description:
Welcome to Open Platformer! In this game, you play and create levels in 3D.

~Editor~
Open Platformer's easy to use editor will make it a snap to make your first level, and anything you can imagine.

~Community~
Interact with other people's levels, and give them a try! 

~Developers~
Let's say you found one of those pesky bugs. Not to worry! I will respond to any reports from the game's built in bug reporting feature.

~Music~
4 amazing songs, 3 of which you can use in your levels, including original compositions made specifically for this game! (Artists include Multex, Kubbi, Julian Calor, and Pointy Pighead Games)

~Controls~
Grab your Xbox controller or just play with the keyboard! Enjoy playing your favorite levels with your preferred style of play.

Note: Extra drivers will needed to be installed to use Xbox controllers on mac. See the settings page for a download link in game.
